definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: The triangular arrowhead takes a streamline shape, with barbs for piercing.
sentences.chinese: 箭鏃呈三棱流線型，有倒刺，利於穿透。

sentences.english: The investigation results reveal that the Spinibarbus fishes share 3 synapomorphies.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果表明，倒刺屬魚類共有3個共同離徵。

sentences.english: The barbed wire fences serve as a reminder of the horrors of the past.
sentences.chinese: 這些帶有倒刺的鐵絲圍欄是對恐怖過去的一種提醒。

sentences.english: The barbed tip of a harpoon.
He didn’t remove the barb but piloted the boat to land and got help.
sentences.chinese: 他並沒有拔掉魚的倒刺而是返航到岸上需求幫助。

sentences.english: Barbs on the crown of gilded wire.

definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
bloody mouth (from devouring freshly killed prey)
